settings.heading: The best way for Aussies to play
What is a Competitive Player Profile?
settings.row_content: Your Competitive Player Profile is the unique profile generated by connecting your Tennis Australia Tennis ID and UTR Rating. With this connection established, your playing history and upcoming match data will be stored securely, enabling access to advanced analytics. It's not easier than ever to establish your Competitive Player Profile. Get started here!

settings.heading: Why do I need a Competitive Player Profile?
settings.row_content: All players competing in Australia must have a Competitive Player Profile in order to enter endorsed events and leagues. This change went into effect 1 September 2023. Already more than 100,000 Aussies have completed their Competitive Player Profile! So whether you play for fun at your local club or professionally on the UTR Pro Tennis Tour, your Competitive Player Profile will ensure you have the best playing experience for your level.

settings.heading: What does the Competitive Player Profile have to do with Power Subscription?
settings.row_content: Securing your Competitive Player Profile also unlocks the best annual pricing for the UTR Sports Power Subscription. Now Tennis Australia registrants can upgrade to an annual subscription for only A$100. That's a monthly rate of only A$8.33! Click here to view all Power Subscription benefits.

settings.heading: I have a Tennis Australia Tennis ID but need a UTR Sports profile
settings.row_content: If you have a Tennis Australia Tennis ID but don‚Äôt yet have a UTR Sports profile, it's easier than ever to get a UTR Sports profile and link the two accounts to create your Competitive Player Profile. This helpful UTR Sports support article has all of the information you'll need, including screenshots. Click or tap here to get started.

settings.heading: I have a UTR Sports profile but need a Tennis Australia Tennis ID
settings.row_content:
If you have a UTR Sports profile but need a Tennis Australia Tennis ID, it's easier than ever to get your Tennis ID and link the two accounts to create your Competitive Player Profile.

1. Go to the Tennis Australia¬†Match Centre.

2. Register for a new account.

3. Once your account has been created, you‚Äôll be logged into your Match Centre dashboard.

4. Click on the ‚ÄòActivate my UTR Rating‚Äô button.¬†

5. Follow the instructions on screen to link your Tennis ID to your UTR Sports profile.

6. Congratulations! You‚Äôve completed your Competitive Player Profile and can either stay on Match Centre or explore tournaments near you on the UTR Sports website.

settings.heading: How can I upgrade to an annual UTR Sports Power Subscription for the lowest price ever?
settings.row_content: Once you‚Äôve completed your Competitive Player Profile (see above steps), you simply tap or click here to upgrade to an annual Power Subscription at our lowest price ever!

settings.heading: What is the UTR Rating?
settings.row_content: The UTR Rating is the world‚Äôs most accurate rating system. It promotes fair and competitive play across the tennis world. All players are rated on the same 1.00-16.50 point global scale based on daily match results.

settings.heading: Tennis Australia: FAQs on UTR Sports
UTR Rating: Official rating of Tennis Australia
settings.description: As the UTR Rating is the official rating for tennis in Australia, it‚Äôs easier than ever for Aussies to find level-based play and enhance their tennis experience.
